name: Where is my cat (bubbleplay)
description:
◈◈Where is my cat◈◈

Please find my lost cat~

Memory game where you remember the trap location and find a cat avoiding the trap

It's a very simple, but it's a puzzle game that improves Memory.

◈◈Operation key ◈◈

Move: Click(Touch) the up, down, left, right blocks to move them

If you step on orange block or trap blocks, the time is reduced.
